casebody.data:
DIAMOND 67, LLC
v.
Derek V. OATIS et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 11, 2016

James F. Sullivan, in support of the petition.

Richard P. Weinslein, in opposition.

*229The petition by the defendants Derek V. Oatis, Lobo & Associates, LLC, and Glenn Montigny, for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 659, 144 A.3d 1055 (2016), is denied.
